creditline: Gift of funds from the James Ford Bell Foundation
description: ginger jar-shaped body with capped swan neck spout; c-scroll handle with a knob on top and molded ring foot; cut-card work on cover; engraved coat of arms within scroll and foliate cartouche on front
markings: [T/T*M], engraved, on bottom; 4 stamps, on bottom; 1 stamp, on edge of cap; 2 stamps, on edge of lid
title: Chocolate pot
